Press the switch (Accept ± 1 µs )\nPrimary & Secondary fault LEDS off.All six green LEDS keep glowing.No alarm
Press the switch (Accept “Inhibited Interrogation)\n(Reply rate reduces to 80%)
Primary and secondary fault LEDs glow in both monitors
Delay, separation, efficiency reply rate LEDs (green) in both monitors are off
